title: Pete Alonso
summary:
Peter Morgan Alonso (born December 7, 1994), nicknamed "Polar Bear", is an American professional baseball first baseman for the New York Mets of Major League Baseball (MLB). He made his MLB debut during the 2019 season.
Alonso played college baseball for the Florida Gators before the Mets selected him in the 2016 MLB draft. Alonso made his MLB debut on Opening Day in 2019. won the National League's Rookie of the Year Award in 2019, setting a major league record for rookies with 53 home runs. He is a two time MLB All-Star and he led the league in home runs in 2019 and in runs batted in in 2022.
